# Link Previews ‚õìÔ∏è‚Äçüí•
Rich previews for URLs &mdash; using automatic fetching and rendering of link metadata.

## Installation
- &hellip;

## Usage
- Choose a hypertext link _e.g. `https://www.example.com`_.
- Execute the &ldquo;Preview Link&rdquo; command.
